channel.title: Grateful Dead on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Grateful Dead on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Dead & Company Mark 60 Years of the Grateful Dead at San Francisco’s Golden Gate Park
item.description: Trey Anastasio of Phish, Billy Strings and Sturgill Simpson were among the special guests to join the band over three nights of concert and amid a city-wide celebration.

item.title: Dead & Company Mark 60 Years of the Grateful Dead at San Francisco’s Golden Gate Park
item.description: Trey Anastasio of Phish, Billy Strings and Sturgill Simpson were among the special guests to join the band over three nights of concert and amid a city-wide celebration.

item.title: Dead & Company’s SF Shows Will Be Livestreamed for Home Viewing Via Nugs, on Top of Imax Screenings
item.description: Fans of the Grateful Dead and its offshoot Dead & Company will have multiple ways to access the latter group’s upcoming weekend of 60th-anniversary-commemorating shows at San Francisco&#8217
